rules.natural: If an oil spill occurs in the river, then ecological damage follows in the river.
Whenever ecological damage occurs in the river, water contamination follows in the river.
If water contamination occurs in the river, then pollution does not happen in the river.
Provided that a public protest occurs regarding the river, pollution does not occur in the river.
Either the government approves development related to the river or a public protest occurs regarding the river.
A cleanup operation is conducted in the river, or it is not the case that the government approves development related to the river.
If the river does not have protected status, then pollution occurs in the river.

facts.natural: An oil spill occurs in the river.
A cleanup operation is not conducted in the river.

steps.natural: Under the condition that ecological damage occurs in the river, pollution does not occur in the river.
Provided that an oil spill occurs in the river, it is not the case that pollution occurs in the river.
Pollution does not occur in the river.
The government does not approve development related to the river.
A public protest occurs regarding the river.
Pollution does not occur in the river.

(A2 → A3).natural: If an oil spill occurs in the river, then ecological damage follows in the river.

(A2 → ¬A1).natural: Provided that an oil spill occurs in the river, it is not the case that pollution occurs in the river.

(A3 → A4).natural: Whenever ecological damage occurs in the river, water contamination follows in the river.

(A3 → ¬A1).natural: Under the condition that ecological damage occurs in the river, pollution does not occur in the river.

(A4 → ¬A1).natural: If water contamination occurs in the river, then pollution does not happen in the river.

(A5 → ¬A1).natural: Provided that a public protest occurs regarding the river, pollution does not occur in the river.

(A6 ∨ A5).natural: Either the government approves development related to the river or a public protest occurs regarding the river.

(A7 ∨ ¬A6).natural: A cleanup operation is conducted in the river, or it is not the case that the government approves development related to the river.

(¬G → A1).natural: If the river does not have protected status, then pollution occurs in the river.

A2.natural: An oil spill occurs in the river.

A5.natural: A public protest occurs regarding the river.

¬A1.natural: Pollution does not occur in the river.

¬A6.natural: The government does not approve development related to the river.

¬A7.natural: A cleanup operation is not conducted in the river.
